Reviews.Title: “Always great service with smiling faces”

Reviews.Content: 5 th time staying el buen cafe attitude staff brought grandkids 1st visit puerto rico loved move el buen cafe visit located rt 2 makes travel sights easy west island tourist friendly el cafe continue stay puerto rico clean safe comfrotable affordable ron carmen mason

Reviews.Title: “Good, clean place to stay with nice people”

Reviews.Content: nice clean stay fancy stay clean safe people hotel cafe street nice stayed wednesday night party basement floor party continued definitely kept awake hard time price paid 107 night pretty price puerto rico nicer money type toom pay 50

Reviews.Title: “Great deal for the money and extremely clean!”
Reviews.Author: keeptraveling01
Reviews.Content: looking luxury hotel looking hotel deal friendly staff hotel located close downtown arecibo extremely clean surprisingly spacious couch desk bed hotel means customer service cafe street breakfast lot locals eat stop people traveling puerto rico business travelers close beaches nice beaches beautiful stay simple pool exceptionally clean

Reviews.Content: time staying parador puerto rico experience accesible location nice facilities kept friendly staff clean size clean bathroom ac cable tv amenities deal pay lots money nice stay definitely deal staying hotel chain little noise street bad coffee bread included breakfast delicious miami fl
